metadata.title: Swarovski 5139473 DUO:PENDANT HEART SIAM/CRY/MIX
description: Designed with Miranda Kerr, this mixed-plated pendant features one heart in crystal pave and one in rose gold-plated metal. The pendant comes on a chain embellished with red crystals for extra sparkle. Also available in a larger size. Length: 14 7/8" - Pendant size: 3/8 x 3/8"
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "3.5 x 3.5 x 1.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces", "Item model number": "5139473", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "August 1, 2015", "Manufacturer": "SWAROVSKI"}
